author: EasyE0287
body:
If you feel there's unaccounted for growth in infrastructure, you may want to play the firms that will design or supply the materials.

Jacobs, AECOM, Stantec, NVEE are all solid design companies. The first three are massive, established firms, while the last is a high-growth developing firm.

Vulcan and Martin-Marietta are solid picks for materials (concrete, asphalt, aggregate).

Trimble is a potential good pick for GPS & Survey equipment, and construction management software (e-builder).

author: chromegreen
body:
BMI water metering and management

TRMB GPS mapping for precision farming

GPP manages infrastructure for ethanol generated from corn

Veolia Environnement, VIE on the SBF exchange, energy generation from agricultural waste and maure.
